mapper.select: select num, title, author, content, to_char(writeday,'mm/dd') writeday, readCnt from myboard order by num desc

select num, title, author, content, to_char(writeday,'mm/dd') writeday, readCnt from myboard where author=#{userId}
and title like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
and content like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
order by num desc

select count(*) from myboard
where author=#{userId}
and title like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
and content like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into myboard (num, title, author, content) values(myboard_seq.nextval, #{title},#{author},#{content})
